nodes.text: Corellian Technologies was an armor manufacturer specializing in personal defense systems. During the Galactic Civil War, industrial saboteurs tried to steal the company's tursturin supplies. As the company didn't want to involve local or Imperial law enforcement agencies to avoid questions about the tursturin's provenance, they hired an independent strike team to destroy the saboteurs and their stronghold. Two of the armors they produced included the A3AA personal defense module, which lacked in physical protection but had an emission field which repelled blaster shots, and a HuntSuit, which cost about 2,900 credits.
